name: In Vicious Circle
description:
You are an elderly man, who is having a heart attack. During your final 30 (or so) seconds of life, what will your final choice be?

HOW TO PLAY:

Move the character with WSAD, you can click objects with a pointer when near them. Select dialogue options to choose your fate. Have a good time dying.

THE TEAM:

Nikola Müller (Nik): 2d assets, animation,

Martin Sikora (martin sikora): game design, game writing, music & sfx search

Cezary Skorupka (Kalean): game design, game writing, music & sfx search

Łukasz Spierewka (Spierek): 2d assets, coding

Jakub Ziembiński (jakub.ziembinski): coding

Special Thanks To: Maria B. Garda.

MUSIC & SFX: spukkin, kbnevel, RutgerMuller, jesabat, Robinhood76, cameronmusic, timtube, MAJ061785, StevenBrown, Slanesh, brianhanson2nd, vtkproductions.com, LG, HowardFromBroward, XTYL33, pboix, m_O_m from freesound.org, Kevin MacLeod from incompetech.com
